thread.title: Twitter is relentlessly trolling Chuck Pagano for that awful fake punt play - Sports
thread.title_full: Twitter is relentlessly trolling Chuck Pagano for that awful fake punt play - Sports

author: boston.com
title: Twitter is relentlessly trolling Chuck Pagano for that awful fake punt play - Sports
text:
Indianapolis Colts coach Chuck Pagano already took full responsibility for the botched fake punt play late in the third quarter of last night’s Colts-Patriots game, a play some have compared to the butt fumble as one of the worst plays in recent memory.
Related Links Colts’ botched fake punt was an ‘insane’ fail Morning Sports Update: Chuck Pagano takes blame for fake punt fail, tries to explain Colts still can’t compare to the Patriots “Alignment-wise, we weren’t lined up correctly and then a communication breakdown between the quarterback and snapper,” Pagano said in post-game remarks. “That’s all on me. I take full responsibility on that.”
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Despite that seemingly thorough explanation, when Pagano took to Twitter this morning to promote his radio show and ask fans to send in questions, Internet jokesters took the opportunity to relentlessly troll the coach who made the Buttfumble almost look competent.
Tweet your questions for Coach Pagano here and have them answered tonight on @Colts Monday Night starting at 6 on @1070thefan
— Chuck Pagano Show (@PaganoShow) October 19, 2015 As usual, Twitter was up to the task.
@PaganoShow @PFTCommenter @Colts @1070thefan do you think colt anderson showed enough to earn a spot at qb
— former r&b legend (@40pctoff) October 19, 2015 @PaganoShow @Colts @1070thefan do you consider the fake punt a success because no one died (that we know of)?
— cuppycup (@cuppycup) October 19, 2015 @PaganoShow @Colts @1070thefan would you consider that fake punt a bad football play or good performance art?
— Steve Silver (@SteveTSRA) October 19, 2015 . @PaganoShow @Colts @1070thefan Were you high when you designed that fake punt play?
— Dave (@BmoreDaveS) October 19, 2015 @PaganoShow @Colts @1070thefan Coach, can you tell us what child won the "you get to call a play" contest on that fake punt?
— Jon Easter (@johnnystir) October 19, 2015 @PaganoShow @Colts @1070thefan If you were a Walmart greeter, would you stand right by the front door, or would stand in the pharmacy?
— Freggie Krueger (@_RScottWhitley_) October 19, 2015 Pagano’s already-tenuous hold on his job likely got a little looser last night.
@PaganoShow @Colts @1070thefan Have you started packing yet or are you waiting until you're officially fired?
— V M (@v_m_phil) October 19, 2015 Signs of Deflategate in Indy
